alert.note: Alert for Southern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 24 at 11:59AM MST until February 25 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST SATURDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Southern Rocky Mountain Front and adjacent foothills and plains. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Visibilities may drop below 1/4 mile due to falling and blowing snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills may fall to as low as 30 below at times, especially through this evening.
info.instruction: To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Southern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
